title: What are the entrance exams? - Quora

response.answer_text: An entrance examination is an examination that educational institutions conduct to select prospective students for admission. It may be held at any stage of education, from primary to tertiary, even though it is typically held at tertiary stage. In India, entrance examinations are chiefly confined to medicine, engineering, and management. These range from the BITS Pilani admission test and IIT-JEE where only one in a hundreds can hope to get admission to state level entrances which are many and varied.

These are the exams conducted by institutes or some other bodies to make selection of students from amongst a large number of exams takers for admission into the institutes to pursue their choice streams / courses .
